jobInfo.address: 深圳宝安区荣成达科创慧谷厂房405

brandComInfo.introduce:
深圳市南柯电子科技有限公司成立于2020年，是一家专业从事EMC器件和连接器的研发，生产，销售为一体的资深企业，总部位于深圳。
       主要产品包括:大电流功率电感，一体成型电感，磁胶电感，SMD功率电感，插件电感，磁棒电感，DC&信号共模抑制器，AC共模电感，变压器，板对板连接器，线对板连接器，通信接口，接线端子，欧式连接器，压接端子及高速连接器等，广泛应用于工业控制、汽车电子，医疗电子、新能源电机、通讯设备，数字功放、金融电子，电源系统等领域。
       南柯电子致力于让客户都能享受到最专业的EMC产品及服务，即EMC器件的选型，EMC仿真，EMC培训及EMC整改服务，凭借先进的管理体系，雄厚的开发能力、优异的产品质量和完善的服务，南柯电子已成为众多国内外知名企业的电子元件供应商。
       Shenzhen Nanke Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2020. It is a senior enterprise specializing in the research and development, production and sales of EMC components and connectors. Its headquarter is located in Shenzhen.
       The main products include: high current power inductors, Moding power choke, NR inductors, SMD power inductors, DIP inductors, Rod inductors, DC& signal common mode choke, AC common mode choke, transformers , Board-to-board connectors, wire-to-board connectors, communication interfaces, terminals, European connectors, crimp terminals and high-speed connectors, etc., are widely used in industrial control, automotive electronics, medical electronics, new energy motors, communication equipment , digital power amplifier, financial electronics, power system and other fields.
       Nanke Electronics is committed to allowing customers to enjoy the most professional EMC products and services, namely EMC components selection, EMC simulation, EMC training and EMC rectification &testing services. With advanced management system, strong development capabilities and excellent products Quality and perfect service, Nanke Electronics has become a supplier of electronic components for many well-known enterprises at home and abroad.
